name: Mediterranean Mashed Potatoes
description: Lighten up your mashed potatoes with this Mediterranean-inspired side dish!
preparation: In a small bowl, combine seasoning with hot water. Set aside.
Peel and chop potatoes into small pieces; place in Multipurpose Steamer. Cover and microwave on high for 10–12 min or until potatoes are soft.
Using Ground Meat Separator, mash potatoes with seasoning mixture and oil to desired consistency. Stir in green onions, olives, and sunflower seeds, if using. Add toppings, if desired.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and 1 cup chopped veggies.
